backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping app features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short human-written summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and OKLCH-based global styles defining layout variables and color tokens for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, title, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component routing between Search and Settings inside ThemeProvider and layout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the DeltaV3 logo image with configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Global layout with header, logo, nav buttons, main container, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated/anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hooks handling login, logout, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing backend actor; no backend queries implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for black‑and‑purple theme with dynamic theming support.
frontend/src/lib/duckduckgo.ts: Client helper querying DuckDuckGo Instant Answer API and extracting structured search results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a DuckDuckGo-powered search UI with input, loading and error states, and result display.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI to customize the primary theme color using presets or manual input, with local persistence.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Manages theme state, converts hex colors to OKLCH, persists the primary color, and updates CSS variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, existing features, and architectural constraints for the DeltaV3 site.
